Lyrics: Kuch din se mujhe Teri aadat ho gayi hai x (2) Kuch din se meri Tu zarurat ho gayi hai Tere labon se main hasun Teri lehron mein bahun Mujhko kasam lage agar Tere bina main jiyun Kuch din se mujhe Teri aadat ho gayi hai Kuch din se meri Tu zarurat ho gayi hai Tere labon se main hasun Teri lehron mein bahun Mujhko kasam lage agar Tere bina main jiyun Teri hawa mein hi udoon Main aaj-kal, main aaj-kal Tere kadam se hi chaloon Main aaj-kal, main aaj-kal Kuch bhi nahin mujhmein mera Jo bhi hai woh hai tera Kuch din se mujhe Teri aadat ho gayi hai Aksar ataa pata mera Rehta nahin, rehta nahin Koi nishan mera kahin Milta nahin, milta nahin Dhoondha gaya jab bhi mujhe Teri gali mein mila Kuch din se mujhe Teri aadat ho gayi hai Kuch din se meri Tu zarurat ho gayi hai Tere labon se main hasun Teri lehron mein bahun Mujhko kasam lage agar Tere bina main jiyun

Laila main laila, aisi hun laila Har koyi chahe muhjse milna akela Jisko bhi dekhun, duniya bhula dun Majnu bana doon, aisi main laila Ho yeh kaise hain lamhe Jo itne hasin hain Meri aankhein mujhse Yeh kya keh rahi hain Tum aa gaye ho (laila) Yakin kaise aaye (laila) Ke dil keh raha hai (laila) Tumhe choo ke dekhun Laila main laila, aisi hun laila Har koyi chahe muhjse milna akela

Ek ho gaye hum aur tum Humma, humma, humma Tu udd gayi nindein re Hey.. humma Ek ho gaye hum aur tum Tu udd gayi nindein re Aur khanki payal masti mein To kangan.. Yeh pehli baar mile Tum pe yeh dum nikle Tum pe yeh jawani dheere dheere Maddham machle re Humma humma, humma humma humma Hey humma humma, humma humma humma Mujhe dar iss baat ka hai bas Ki kahin na yeh raat nikal jaaye Meri itne bhi paas tu aa mat Kahin meri hathon se na baat nikal jaaye Bolunga sach mein jo de tu ijazat Sabar bhi ab karne laga bagawat Zulfein hai zalim aur aakhein hai aafat Lagta hai hone wali hai qayamat Mat tadpa aise tu Na kar na-insaafi Jo ghalti karne wala hoon main uske liye Pehle se hi mangta hoon maafi Khili chandini jaisa ye badan Janam mila tumko Man mein socha tha jaisa roop Tera aaya nazar humko Sitam khuli khuli yeh sanam gori gori Yeh baahein karti hain yoon Humein tumne jab gale lagaya to Kho hi gaye hum Humma humma, humma humma humma Hey humma humma, humma humma humma Ek ho gaye hum aur tum Humma, humma, humma Tu udd gayi nindein re Hey humma.. Humma..

Main nai naweli aayi Main nai naweli aayi Sharmaai re, ghabraai re Main nai naweli aayi Main nai naweli aayi Saaton ajoobon se ajoobi yeh jodi Palle padi main jaake kiske nighodi (x2) Gift mein jaise mil jaave Langoor ko hira-panna Idiot hai mera banna (x4) Main boli banna manne kulla karade Jaake bazar se datoon la de Yeh jaake datoon ke badle Khet se laaya ganna Idiot, ho idiot Idiot hai mera banna (x4) Mera nau daandi ka bajna Ji mera nau daandi ka bajna Mere sasure ne diye padhwaye Jhanajhan jhanajhan Jhanajhan baaje bajna Ji mera nau daandi ka bajna Main boli banna manne picture dikha de Balcony ki do tho ticket kata de Haan main boli banna manne picture dikha de Balcony ki do tho ticket kata de Yoon to saara ke saara theatre tha khaali Banne ne ek ticket hi nikaali Bola ke interval tak dekh le tu Haan bola ke interval tak dekh le tu Interval ke aage ki main dekh loonga Ek ticket se kaam chale to do leke kya karna Idiot, ho idiot Idiot hai mera banna (x8)

Kisi ko mera shauk hai Kisi ko mera hai nasha Jawani kehte hain mujhe Hain mere aashiq har jagah Kisi ko meri hasratein Kisi ki main hoon dilruba Mujhe paane ke vaste Maange dua Saara zamana haseeno ka deewana Zamana kahe phir kyun Bura hai dil lagana (x2) Saara zamana.. Yeh daur keh raha hai Tu aaj pyar karle Jo kabhi bhi khatm na ho Woh aitbar karle Kisi ko meri hasratein Kisi ki main hoon dilruba Mujhe paane ke vaste Maange dua Saara zamana haseeno ka deewana Zamana kahe phir kyun Bura hai dil lagana (x2) Saara zamanaâ€¦

Jhoota jag rain basera Saancha dard mera Mrigtrishna sa moh piya Nata mera tera Naina, jo saanjhe khwaab dekhte the Naina, bichhad ke aaj ro diye hain yoon Naina, jo milke raat jaagte the Naina, sehar mein palkein meechte hain yoon Judaa huye kadam Jinhone li thi yeh kasam Milke chalenge hardum Ab baant-te hain yeh gham Bheege naina, jo khidkiyon se jhaankte the Naina, ghutan mein band ho gaye hainyoon Saans hairan hai, man pareshan hai Ho rahi si kyun ruansa yeh meri jaan hai Kyun nirasha se hai Aas haari hui Kyun sawalon ka utha sa Dil mein toofan hai Naina, the aasman ke sitare Naina, grahan mein aaj toot-te hain yoon Naina, kabhi jo dhoop senkte the Naina, thehar ke chhaon dhoondte hain yoon Judaa huye kadam Jinhone li thi yeh kasam Milke chalenge hardum Ab baant-te hain yeh gham Bheege naina, jo saanjhe khwaab dekhte the Naina, bichhad ke aaj ro diye hain yoon

Jaanu.. Chal na kuchh karte hain Aa lakeerein padhte hain Chal na kuchh karte hain Dheere dheere zara dum lena Pyar se jo mile gham lena Dil pe zara wo kamm lena Ok jaanu, tu dhin dhin na x (2) Kal ki beeti kal hui thi Aane wala kal bada hai Dil ne phir karwat li dekho Dil mein koi pal pada hai Dheere dheere zara dum lena Pyar se jo mile gham lena Dil pe zara wo kamm lena Ok jaanu, tu dhin dhin na Jaanu.. Chal na kuchh karte hain Aa lakeerein padhte hain Chal na kuchh karte hain Yeh aayu, yeh vayu Yeh mangal pe dangal Bali na kyun kisi se Tu lucky lagti hai Sabhi kuchh hai kanya lakiron mein Lekin agan to nahin hai Tu lucky lagti hai Dheere dheere zara dum lena Pyar se jo mile gham lena Dil pe zara wo kamm lena Ok jaanu, tu dhin dhin na x (2) Hey nasamajh si ek ladki Pure dil ki chor nikli De gayi maathe pe rakh ke Shaam ke suraj ki titli Dheere dheere zara dum lena Pyar se jo mile gham lena Dil pe zara wo kamm lena Ok jaanu, tu dhin dhin na Jaanu.. Chal na kuchh karte hain Aa lakeerein padhte hain Chal na kuchh karte hain Aa lakeerein padhte hain Jaanu..
